Articles.Content:
Hello,

I'm new here and figuring out how to insert an imgur album into a post. I want to master it here rather than mess up a specific thread. I saw the instruction in one of the forum welcome posts:

"You can also embed full Imgur albums to the forum by setting the

I can embed a single picture from my imgur account. My problem is that I can't seem to find the right imgur code to insert for a whole album. I use the text that imgur gives me when I select "Embed album", though I strip off the stuff before the http and after the last slash. Here's what imgur gives me:

<iframe class="imgur-album" width="100%" height="550" frameborder="0" src="http://imgur.com/a/chTvF/embed"></iframe>

Background- I'm an old guy who has never joined a forum before, so I haven't done this stuff anywhere.

Here goes:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

tags around your Imgur album code (

http://imgur.com/a/szz8j#0

) ".

I can embed a single picture from my imgur account. My problem is that I can't seem to find the right imgur code to insert for a whole album. I use the text that imgur gives me when I select "Embed album", though I strip off the stuff before the http and after the last slash. Here's what imgur gives me:

<iframe class="imgur-album" width="100%" height="550" frameborder="0" src="http://imgur.com/a/chTvF/embed"></iframe>

Background- I'm an old guy who has never joined a forum before, so I haven't done this stuff anywhere.

Here goes:

[imgUR]http://imgur.com/a/chTvF/">Javascript is disabled. View full album

Nope, that didn't work. I get the imgur error image. With or without the slash after the 'F'.

Maybe:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Nope. Doesn't work with or without the s (I put them in there from the example). I know that stand for Uniform Resource Locator but I don't know what might be meant to be in there.

How about using everything imgur gives me when I select "Embed Album"?:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Nope.

I think I'll sit and mull it over for a while here. If someone can see what I'm doing wrong I would appreciate the information.

Edited February 24, 2014 by PLAD
added useful information

Omit the # (and the other url gumph too)

Ie:

[ imgur]szz8j[/imgur]

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited February 24, 2014 by sal_vager
Beat by sal lol, but ya he's right on the money

If that's all, oh my.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Let's post and see...
Lol, glad you got it working

Hello, A final note and bit of knowledge for those who may visit this thread in the future. Sal and AlamoVampire's suggestion worked perfectly, by just putting the small letter-and-number code between the IMGUR brackets the album displayed correctly. However I then went back to imgur and deleted the little test album I had made for this post (I'm always trying to keep my inbox and whatnot as uncluttered as possible). I also wondered if this forum keeps copies of the pictures and albums once they are linked. I now see they do not, which makes sense, but hey, now I'm sure.

So future viewers who see this post will now see the imgur error screen where I say I successfully put the album and wonder if it didn't work. Sorry about that. It worked.

Checking it:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I was wondering the same thing.

Thanks y'all.
